meanings.definition: A type of pigment found in certain foods and used as a color additive in animal feed.
meanings.sent1: The canthaxanthins give the chicken feed its bright color.
meanings.sent2: The canthaxanthins are added to fish food to enhance their color.
meanings.sent3: The canthaxanthins in the food made the birds look like they were wearing colorful costumes.
meanings.sent4: The canthaxanthins painted the landscape with vibrant hues.
meanings.sent5: The canthaxanthins transformed the dull food into a rainbow feast for the animals.
